thread.section_title: Muscle Meals Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Muscle Meals Direct | musclemealsdirect.com.au
thread.title: Emma
thread.title_full: Muscle Meals Direct reviewed by Emma

author: Emma
title: Emma
text:
I am on the lite meals, x3 and the food has been so much better than I expected. Its so easy, little fuss and has made my life genuinely a lot easier.
Not being able to swap out a meal you dont like, but didn't know you didn't like until it was too late because the next order had to be done is a little bit of a bummer, but over all, really happy with it. After the first week you know what you like and not its a problem! The variety is excellent! I am not bored eating the same thing over and over again! THe option to customize meat with sides and sauces is the best part! 100% recommend!
